main event: On 26 August 1949, an unidentified flying object was sighted at Davis-Monthan AFB, Tucson, Arizona by a reliable military observer.
interesting points: The object appeared to be triangular with rounded edges and had a brownish-hazy color., The observer followed the object visually for about 60 seconds., The object was moving at a high speed with no sound, following a level path., The object was at an estimated altitude of 50,000 feet when first sighted., No radar or other aircraft were detected in the vicinity at the time of the sighting.
witness description: A reliable military observer and weather officer.
